articles.author: Sinéad Baker
articles.title: Afghanistan earthquake kills at least 950 people, death rise likely
articles.description: The USGS said the earthquake hit near the city of Khōst, southeastern Afghanistan. Some of the villages hit are in remote mountainous areas.
articles.content:
At least 950 people were killed after a strong earthquake hit Afghanistan early on Wednesday morning, local officials said. It is the highest death toll from an earthquake this year so far.

articles.title: Crypto companies have announced more than 1,700 layoffs in June alone
articles.description: Last year, when the cryptocurrency market boomed, some crypto exchanges shelled out millions to expand their market share.
articles.content:
Crypto winter is coming and so are crypto layoffs.

articles.title: Company refused to accept $20,000 from former manager who made mistake
articles.description: John Szczecina lost his job after charging $0.69 per gallon for gas, a $20,000 mistake. The company said in a letter it "does not want the money raised."
articles.content:
